text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi India have USD475 billion in foreign reserves,this coronavirus is the biggest disaster of this century,why not @narendramodi allot USD100 billion to small & medium business so every1 including migrant worker & employee of sme at least get 70% of their salary for next 3-4 month.
